channel.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_User_Customer on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_User_Customer
item.description: SoftLayer_User_Customer Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_Customer data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer customer portal user. Personal information in this type such as names, addresses, and phone numbers are not necessarily associated with the customer account the user is assigned to. Local accountId A portal user's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|customer account]] id. Type: integer address1 The first line of the mailing address belonging to a portal user.
